Text.Page:
The Lokians are at it again. And don't ask me what "it" isâ€”I just follow Kardelen's orders.

Hunt down {@LinkCreature:18#19#Lokian vanguards}, {@LinkCreature:18#20#Lokian slayers}, {@LinkCreature:18#21#Lokian skullcleavers} and {@LinkCreature:18#113#Kaltrun of Doom} Break their weapons, that they might know the shame of defeat!

Report to Dorinne in Sietch Bidaum when you're done cutting a bloody swath through their ranks.
So many broken weapons...so many broken Lokians.
You aren't afraid of the Lokians, are you?
